capture_token.title: Capture token
capture_token.description: Fill your Capture token in the Capture App. To access your tokens, you need a Capture App account and you can sign in with email or wallet to acquire the Capture Token.

asset_type.title: Asset type
asset_type.description: The type of asset to be added to the Blockchain.

metadata_texts.title: 'texts' input as asset metadata
metadata_texts.description: Include the `texts` input in the asset metadata on the Blockchain.

metadata_structured_data.title: 'structured_data' input as asset metadata
metadata_structured_data.description: Include the `structured_data` input in the asset metadata on the Blockchain.

metadata_metadata.title: 'metadata' input as asset metadata
metadata_metadata.description: Include the `metadata` input in the asset metadata on the Blockchain.
